document.topic_text: Company InformationSince 1990Specializing in Axial fan, Radiator Fan, Blower Fan, Motor Fan,DC Motor,Brushless Motor,Hub Motor,Auto Parts(Die casting and plastic parts). FAQ1,What custom modifications are available? SLT can provide motor with customized shafts, mounted encoders, various controls(integral, hall only, or sensorless), and alternate magnet materials for power density. 2,What are the advantages of using a brushless motor versus a brush style motor?
